alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 11:09AM CDT until August 12 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... * Until noon CDT. * At 1109 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dickson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Dickson, Brentwood, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, White Bluff, Belle Meade, Kingston Springs, Pegram, Burns, Bellevue, Antioch, Fairview, Charlotte, Berry Hill, Bells Bend and Natchez Trace At Highway 96. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 170 and 206, and between mile markers 209 and 214. Interstate 65 between mile markers 64 and 82. Interstate 24 between mile markers 52 and 59. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
